text.text_translated: An earthquake is when the ground shakes a lot. Earthquakes break all kinds of things, including bridges. Luckily, it is not common for bridges to fall down. This is especially true for new bridges. Engineers know how to design bridges for places with earthquakes. They build them on ground that does not move easily.

All other vocabulary is within the A1/A2 range. Sentence structures are short, simple, and clear, avoiding complex clauses or connectors.

best_attempt.text_translated:
An earthquake is when the ground shakes a lot.
Earthquakes can damage many things, including bridges.
Luckily, it is not common for bridges to fall down.
This is especially true for new bridges.
Engineers have learned how to design bridges for places with earthquakes.
They build them on ground that does not move easily.
